description:
Opinionated balance by the dev
The original ruleset for this game.
Includes custom cards

cards.name: Geck
cards.description:
Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite from Kaycee's Mod.
 Lesser.

cards.name: Adder
cards.description: Finally after all the trials and tribulations, it's a 1-Blood.

cards.name: Beaver
cards.description:
Made a 1-Blood to be a more acceptable card 
 Dams are defined as a Free Bloodless 0/2 with Mightly Leap.

cards.name: Beehive
cards.description:
Increased the health by 1 
 and added Migthy Leap to make it less ass.
 A Bee is defined as a Free Airborne 1/1

cards.name: Black Goat
cards.description: Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite from Kaycee's Mod.

cards.name: Strange Frog
cards.description: Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite by syntaxevasion.

cards.name: Cat
cards.description:
Was made rare to nerf it
 then made common to buff it
 when sacrificed 9 times, it releases an Undead Cat.
 An Undead Cat is defined as an Unkillable 3-Blood 3/6

cards.name: Dire Wolf Pup
cards.description: Made a 1-Blood to make it less ass, but given Fledgling 2 to keep it balanced.

cards.name: Elk Fawn
cards.description: Despite the cries to nerf it, it carrried on.

cards.name: Long Elk
cards.description:
Sheds a Vertebrae at the end of the Owner's turn.
 A Vertebrae is defined as a free 0/1.

cards.name: Great Kraken
cards.description: Note: This card's effect was changed due to it sucking.

Custom card by Limabean.
Card art by syntaxevasion

cards.name: Grizzly
cards.description: Went back to 6 health.

cards.name: Mole
cards.description: Had health increased by 1 to make it less garbage.

cards.name: Burrowing Trap
cards.description:
Made Rare, cost decreased to 1-Blood, and health reduced to 4,
to reduce the downside of giving material to the opponent.

cards.name: Raccoon
cards.description: Used to be a 1/2 and had a lack luster ability./n but now is a genuine menace.

Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite by syntaxevasion.
Was made a 1-Blood to make it a pretty good card.

Card and art by Mark.
The most broken card, hopefully no longer.

cards.name: Stoat
cards.description: Note: Health was increased to 3, still more or useless. Just use River Snapper.

cards.name: Strange Larva

Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite by syntaxevasion.
It gains 1 health each evolution to make its survivablity higher.

cards.name: Warren
cards.description: A Rabbit is defined as a free 0/1.

cards.name: Flying Ant

Had to be nerfed, otherwise would destroy the meta

cards.description:
Had unused art for Act 2 art.
Was made Rare to prevent degenerate Combo decks from being the Meta, thanks Eternal.

cards.name: Ouroboros
cards.description:
This card gains 1 power and 1 health each time it perishes.
Changed to return to your hand in two turns to prevent infinite combos.

cards.name: Pronghorn
cards.description: Ported from Act 1. Act 2 sprite by syntaxevasion.

cards.name: The Daus
cards.description:
The Chimes buffs adjacent cards bearing the sigil Bell Ringer.
 A Chime is defined as a Free Bloodless 0/1 with Mighty Leap.

 Was made to cost 2-Bones because 1-Blood is a horrible cost; it's all ass.

cards.description:
Costed 3_Energy and 1/2 stats.
Was reworked to 2-Energy 1/1 to be more in line with Automaton

cards.name: M3atB0t

cards.name: Plasma Jimmy

cards.name: Energy Conduit
cards.description: Note: Effect was changed to prevent infinitely buffing stim mage.

cards.name: Factory Conduit
cards.description: A L33pB0t is defined as a 3-Energy 1/2 with Mighty Leap.

cards.name: L33pB0t
cards.description: Made to be a 3-Energy 1/2 to make Factory Conduit less bad.

cards.name: Mrs. Bomb
cards.description:
Had to be nerfed, otherwise Urayuli would be stronger than is.
An Explode Bot is defined as a Bloodless 1/1 with Detonator(5).

cards.name: SON1A
cards.description: Health was increased by 1 to make it a passable 3-Energy card.

Custom card by EternalHours and syntaxevasion.
Long overdue.

originally had Power Dice (2), but that made it too ass.
Now has an extra chance to pop off.

Health increased to 3 to make it less bad.

cards.name: Thick Droid
cards.description: Damn Boi!

Custom card by EternalHours and syntaxevasion.
Long overdue.

cards.description: Note: This card's attack was increased to make it worth 6 energy.

cards.name: Shambling Cairn
cards.description:
Custom card by Garf, zpan0317, and Me!
Lesser

cards.name: Bone Heap
cards.description: The Enlarge Ratio was changed to make it not an autoinclude in every deck.

cards.name: Tomb Robber
cards.description: Note: Withered Corpses have the Boneless sigil and will not drop bones.This change was made to prevent multiple infinite combos involving Tomb Robber.

cards.name: Voodoo Doll
cards.description:
Custom card and art by ener.
 Was made free to make it actually usable.

cards.name: Skeleton

Cost was reduced to 2-Bones
to make it playable

cards.name: Bone Lord's Horn
cards.description: Note: This card gives only 1 bone per 1 energy due to the previous effect being overpowered in combination with Bone Heap.

cards.name: Gargoyle
cards.description:
Custom card by syntaxevasion.
Long overdue.
Changed once again.

cards.name: Necromancer
cards.description:
This was the most annoying card to program.
When the king speaks, you listen.

cards.name: Sarcophagus
cards.description:
Was made bloodless, but was compensated by its cost being reduced to 3-Bones
making it somewhat playable.

cards.name: Skelemagus
cards.description: Nerfed again.

cards.name: Zombie
cards.description: This card was given the stinky sigil to differentiate it from Opossom. Suggested by FishGuy101.

cards.name: The Walkers
cards.description:
Was Buffed to 5-Bone 2/2, but was deemed too powerful.
So it was reverted to its original stats

cards.name: Dead Hand
cards.description:
Note: Was made common due to lack of use.
Then rare again.

cards.description: Custom card by SYNTHIA_2000

cards.name: Bonehound
cards.description: Cost was reduced to 6-Bones to make it playable

cards.name: Pharaoh's Pets
cards.description: Used to have Frozen Away, but it was too bad to use.

cards.name: Mummy Lord
cards.description:
Health was reduced to 2 to make it a fair 7-Bone card.
 Was very much unplayable at 8.

so it was reverted to 1/2.

 Is an actual menace now.

cards.name: Moon Shard
cards.description: Emits a pale white light. You feel as though it calls to its brethren.

sigils.Acupuncture: The owner may pay 3 bones: the owner Chooses a creature to gain the Stitched sigil. this card gains Armor.
sigils.Airborne: A card bearing this sigil will strike an opponent directly, even if there is a creature opposing it.
sigils.Amalgamation: A card bearing this sigil assimilates the owner's other creatures, gaining their health, power and sigils.
sigils.Annoying: The creature opposing a card bearing this sigil gains 1 Power.
sigils.Ant Spawner: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Worker Ant is created in the owner's hand.
sigils.Armored: The first time a card bearing this sigil would take damage, prevent that damage.
sigils.Attack Conduit: Other creatures within a circuit completed by a card bearing this sigil gain 1 power.
sigils.Battery Bearer: When a card bearing this sigil is played, it provides an energy cell to its owner.
sigils.Bees Within: Once a card bearing this sigil is struck, a Bee is created in its owner's hand.
sigils.Bellist: Only when a card bearing this sigil is played, a Chime is created on each empty adjacent space. A card bearing this sigil will perform a retaliatory attack against any creature that damages a Chime.
sigils.Bifurcated Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike each opposing space to the left and right of the space across from it.
sigils.Blood Lust: When a card bearing this Sigil attacks an opposing creature and it perishes, this card gains 1 power.
sigils.Blue Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a blue gem to its owner.
sigils.Bomb Latch: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, its owner chooses a creature to gain the Detonator sigil.
sigils.Bomb Spewer: Only when a card bearing this sigil is played, fill all empty spaces with Explode Bots.
sigils.Bomb Spewer (Eternal): When a card bearing this sigil is played, fill every empty space opposing a card with an explode bot.
sigils.Bone Digger: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will generate 1 bone.
sigils.Bone King: When a card bearing this sigil dies, 4 bones are awarded instead of 1.
sigils.Bonehorn: The owner may pay 1 energy: the owner is awarded 3 bones.
sigils.Bonehorn (1): The owner may Pay 1 energy: the owner is awarded 1 bone.
sigils.Boneless: When a card bearing this sigil dies, no bones are awarded.
sigils.Brittle: After attacking, a card bearing this sigil perishes.
sigils.Brittle Latch: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, its owner chooses a creature to gain the Brittle sigil.
sigils.Burrower: When an empty space would be struck, a card bearing this sigil will move to that space to receive the strike instead.
sigils.Corpse Eater: If a creature that the owner owns perishes by combat, a card bearing this sigil in their hand is automatically played in its place.
sigils.Dam Builder: Only when a card bearing this sigil is played, a Dam is created on each empty adjacent space.
sigils.Depleting: When a card bearing this sigil is played, 2 energy cells are removed from its owner
sigils.Detonator: When a card bearing this sigil dies, the creature opposing it, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 10 damage.
sigils.Detonator (5): When a card bearing this sigil dies, the creature opposing it, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 5 damage.
sigils.Disentomb: The owner may pay 1 bone: a skeleton in the owner's hand.
sigils.Disentomb (Corpses): The owner may pay 2 bones: a Withered Corpse in the owner's hand.
sigils.Double Death: When another creature you own dies, it is returned to life and dies again immediately.
sigils.Double Strike: A card bearing this Sigil will strike the opposing space an extra time when attacking.
sigils.Energy Conduit: If a card bearing this sigil is part of a completed circuit, the owner's energy never depletes.
sigils.Energy Conduit (+3): If a card bearing this sigil is part of a completed circuit, the owner's maximum energy increases by 3.
sigils.Energy Gun: The owner may pay 1 energy: deal 1 damage to the creature across from a card bearing this sigil.
sigils.Energy Sniper: The owner may pay 1 energy: the owner chooses an opposing creature to deal 1 damage to.
sigils.Energy Gun (Eternal): The owner may pay energy: deal damage the opposing creature until it dies or the owner runs out of Energy.
sigils.Enlarge: The owner may pay 2 bones: increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.
sigils.Enlarge (3): the owner may pay 3 bones: increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.
sigils.Fecundity: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a copy of it is created in the owner's hand.
sigils.Fecundity (Kaycee): When a card bearing this sigil is played, a copy of it is created in the owner's hand without this sigil.
sigils.Fledgling: A card bearing this sigil will grow into a more powerful form after 1 turn on the board.
sigils.Fledgling 2: A card bearing this sigil will grow into a more powerful form after 2 turns on the board.
sigils.Frozen Away: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, the creature inside is released in its place.
sigils.Gem Animator: mox cards on the owner's side of the board gain 1 power.
sigils.Gem Dependant: If the owner of a card bearing this sigil controls no mox cards, it perishes.
sigils.Gem Detonator (5): When mox cards on the owner's side of the board die, they Detonate (the creature opposing them, as well as adjacent friendly creatures, are dealt 5 damage).
sigils.Gem Guardian: When a card bearing this sigil is played, all mox cards that the owner controls gain Armor.
sigils.Great Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a green, orange, and blue gem to its owner.
sigils.Green Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides a green gem to its owner.
sigils.Guardian: When an opposing creature is placed opposite to an empty space, a card bearing this sigil will move to that empty space.
sigils.Handy: When a card bearing this sigil is played, the owner discards their hand then draws a new hand of 4 cards.
sigils.Hefty: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil. creatures in the way will be pushed in the same direction.
sigils.Hoarder: When a card bearing this sigil is played, the owner searches their deck for any card and takes it into their hand, then they shuffle their deck.
sigils.Leader: Creatures adjacent to a card bearing this sigil gain 1 Power.
sigils.Looter: When a card bearing this sigil deals damage directly, the owner draws a card for each damage dealt.
sigils.Made of Stone: A card bearing this sigil is immune to the effects of touch of death, stinky, annoying, and Steel Trap.
sigils.Many Lives: When a card bearing this sigil is sacrificed it does not perish.
sigils.Marrow Sucker: The owner may pay 2 bones: heal a card bearing this sigil.
sigils.Mental Gemnastics: When a card bearing this sigil is played, the owner draws cards equal to the amount of mox cards they control.
sigils.Mighty Leap: A card bearing this sigil will block an opposing creature bearing the airborne sigil.
sigils.Music Player: A card bearing this sigil plays a song of the owner's choice when played
sigils.Noble Sacrifice: A card bearing this sigil provides an additional Blood.
sigils.Orange Mox: While a card bearing this sigil is on the board, it provides an orange gem to its owner.
sigils.Omni Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike all opposing spaces.
sigils.Power Dice: The owner may pay 1 energy: set the power of a card bearing this sigil randomly between 1 and 6.
sigils.Power Dice (2): The owner may pay 2 energy: set the power of a card bearing this sigil randomly between 1 and 6.
sigils.Rabbit Hole: When a card bearing this sigil is played, a Rabbit is created in the owner's hand.
sigils.Reconstitute: A card bearing this sigil returns to its owner's hand 2 turns after it persihes.
sigils.Repulsive: If a creature would attack a card bearing this sigil, it does not.
sigils.Ruby Heart: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a Ruby Mox is created in its place.
sigils.Scavenger: While a card bearing this sigil is alive on the board, it steals bones that awarded from death fron the opponent's creatures.
sigils.Sentry: When a creature moves into the space opposing a card bearing this sigil, they are dealt 1 damage.
sigils.Sharp Quills: Once a card bearing takes damage, the creature that dealt the damage is dealt a single damage point.
sigils.Shield Latch: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, its owner chooses a creature to gain Armor.
sigils.Side Hustle: When a card bearing this sigil deals damage directly, the owner draws a card from thier side deck for each damage dealt.
sigils.Skeleton Crew: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a Skeleton in its old space.
sigils.Skeleton Crew (Yarr): At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a Skeleton Crew in its old space.
sigils.Sniper: the owner may choose which opposing space a card bearing this sigil strikes.
sigils.Spawn Conduit: Empty spaces within a circuit completed by a card bearing this sigil spawn L33pB0ts at the end of the owner's turn.
sigils.Sprinter: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil.
sigils.Squirrel Shedder: At the end of the owner's turn, a card bearing this sigil will move in the direction inscribed in the sigil and drop a Squirrel in their old space.
sigils.Steel Trap: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, the creature opposing it perishes as well. A Pelt is created in your opponent's hand.
sigils.Stinky: The creature opposing a card bearing this sigil loses 1 Power.
sigils.Stimulate: The owner may pay 3 energy: increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.
sigils.Stimulate (4): The owner may pay 4 energy: increase the power and health of a card bearing this sigil by 1.
sigils.Stitched: Whenever a card bearing the Acupuncture sigil is damaged, this card recieves that damage, and the Acupuncture card recieves 1 damage instead.
sigils.Tentacle: Includes effect of Waterborne. In addition, a card bearing this sigil will transform into a random tentacle at the start of each turn.
sigils.Thick: A card bearing this sigil is juicy, and takes up 2 spaces.
sigils.Touch of Death: When a card bearing this sigil damages another creature, that creature perishes.
sigils.Transformer: At the beginning of the owner's turn a card bearing this sigil will transform to, or from, Beast mode.
sigils.Trifurcated Strike: A card bearing this sigil will strike each opposing space to the left, right, and center of it.
sigils.True Scholar: If the owner has a blue gem, sacrifice a card bearing this sigil to draw 3 cards.
sigils.Unkillable: When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a copy of it is created in the owner's hand.
sigils.Unkillable (Eternal): When a card bearing this sigil perishes, a copy of it is created in your hand without this sigil.
sigils.Vessel Printer: When a card bearing this sigil is damaged, the owner draws a card from the side deck.
sigils.Warded: A card bearing this sigil takes only 1 damage from attacks and card effects.
sigils.Waterborne: A card bearing this sigil submerges itself during the opponent's turn. while submerged, opposing creatures attack its owner directly.
sigils.Worthy Sacrifice: A card bearing this sigil provides an additional 2 Blood.
